sections.title: Questions - Instructions to the User - Annex II

questions.title: Manufacturer identification
questions.content: Have you provided the **manufacturer’s name, registered trade name or trademark, postal address, email or digital contact**, and, where available, the **website** where users can reach you?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Single Point of Contact (SPOC)
questions.content: Have you included a **single point of contact** for reporting and receiving information about **vulnerabilities**, along with a reference to your **coordinated vulnerability disclosure (CVD) policy**?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Product Identification
questions.content: Does your documentation specify the **name, type, and any additional details** that allow **unique identification** of the product with digital elements?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Intended Purpose and Security Environment
questions.content:
Have you clearly described the **intended purpose**, **essential functionalities**, and the **security environment** of the product as provided by the manufacturer?
- ‘Intended Purpose’ means the use for which a product with digital elements is intended by the manufacturer, including the specific context and conditions of use, as specified in the information supplied by the manufacturer in the instructions for use, promotional or sales materials and statements, as well as in the technical documentation

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Foreseeable Misuse and Associated Risks
questions.content: Have you informed users about any **known or reasonably foreseeable circumstances or misuse** that may lead to **significant cybersecurity risks**?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: EU Declaration of Conformity Access
questions.content: Where applicable, have you provided the **internet address** where the **EU Declaration of Conformity** for the product can be accessed?

questions.title: Technical Security Support Information
questions.content: Have you described the **type of technical security support** offered by the manufacturer and specified the **end-date of the support period** for receiving security updates?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Detailed User Instructions

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Software Bill of Materials (SBOM)
questions.content: If a **software bill of materials (SBOM)** is made available, have you informed users **how and where** it can be accessed?
